reviews.review: El segundo mejor juego que haya jugado. El primero es portal 1, pero este es mucho mas hermoso y completo. Lo recomiendo un millon de veces pero jueguen al 1 antes, es muy rapido de jugar y divertido.
Super fun puzzle game to play either alone or with a friend in co-op. Not much replayability as once you've solved a puzzle you already know the solution.
yes everything about this is yes. mooding, yes. Co-op, yes. Game Is amazing and I love it + the graphics are unreal.
Builds so much more on the first Portal and has many more creative puzzles. Equally funny and fun.
es un muy buen juego, de los mejores que he jugado despu√©s del portal 1 lo unico malo es que dura muy poco pero las salas online lo compensan un poco

Portal 2 is one of the greatest game that I have ever played. The story is even better than the first one and the worldbuilding is incredible. The simplistic yet unique premise of the first game comes through here, but even better - the introduction of new game mechanics like gels and lasers add extra layers to the gameplay, the improved graphics and incredible voice acting also help. Would recommend to experienced gamers and new players alike. 10/10
Incredibly great game. Possibly the best $10 I have ever spent.
This is a fantastic game that you can play on your own or with a friend
This game is really fun and really makes you think outside the box. The co-op mode is good for trust building exersizes and really fun in general.
If there ever was a time where I wanted to do science, it would be whenever I play this amazing sequel or the older yet fun and enjoyable Portal 1
Solo dire que la curva de aprendizaje te lleva de la mano y ese puzzle que crees que no puedes completar a los 10 min te hace hace click y se resuelva en una sensacion super satisfactoria mis dieses

Jogo lindo, puzzles criativos, lore maravilhosa, universo mt interessante e trama muito bem desenvolvida, apesar de o foco ser os puzzles que s√£o mt bons, o universo e mapas da comunidade s√£o mt bons, jogo perfeito
Zur seiner Zeit ein Meisterwerk, heute noch sehr gut spielbar.
now THIS is thinking with portals

It's brilliant.
Buy it already
Just give it a try.It's worth your money

Proof that you can improve on perfection.

A historia dos 2 foi muito boaa, sem duvida ums dos melhores acho que √© pedir de mais um portal 3, mas n√©.
Great puzzle game, tons of fun for kids and adults alike. Really like the community contributed content now.
Good plot, good gameplay, nice puzzles
es uno de los mejores juego te  hace pensar y sobre todo la hisrtoria va cambiando no te lo es√®ras
Confesso que joguei somente a historia, mas incrivel como um jogo com mais de 10 anos continua lindo, ainda em 2020, e com uma historia incrivelmente engra√ßada e com um final fantastico.
ITS SO FUN  AND  SOMETIMES HARD BUT  IT Fun fun fun fun fun fun FUN!

BEST GAME EVER. This game is AMAZING. I have never played a game that feels like this. The chambers are amazing and the amount of new types of puzzles this game adds is amazing. One thing this game doeas great is capture the size of aperture science. It is a HUGE place and it shows that perfectly. Even though this game is a little old, it is a masterpiece and everyone NEEDS to get it. It is by FAR my favorite game and I have no IDEA how another game could top it.

Many a hour spent playing this!

estaba escribiendo yo algunas cosas  , cuando me acorde que tenia que hacer una rese√±a de este juego .

si te gusto salta , hacer portales y matar algunos robots en el anterior portal , entonces portal 2 te va a gustar seguro....
debo decir que es repetitivo , osera a los niveles , son cada vez mas dificil si , pero de hacer portales y salta siempre esta en todos lados , tanto de jugar la historia , y depues le modo Coop que es otra cosa aun mejor si queres jugar con un amigo y divertite pensado como pasar una prueba .
el juego esta bien no le vi nigun tipo de bug segun cuando yo lo jugue , si pensas que no podes avanzar , es por que no sabes que tenes que hacer o abrir bien los ojos , tal como dice , son (Pruebas) que tenes que pasar , asi que abrir bien los ojos y pensar a todo lo que veas .

en conclusi√≥n ,esta bien para pasar unas horas por dia para termina la historia y etc como el Coop con un amigo y ya . Compralo con Oferta mejor que es mucho mas barato , pero si estan tan desesperados entonces compralo ahora.

debo decir que me gusto mucho la musica del final en modo historia.

mi nota : 10
A fun, singleplayer experience. But in cooperative you get to screw with each other.

Great single player game to test your brain. Even if the puzzles come easy to you the comedy is amazing and there are twists and turns. After you play the single player there is a decent sized Co-Op "campaign".
I will say i got a little frustrated for certain puzzles, but that's to be expected. I finished the whole game in a single day. Not because of length' but because i was so into it i didn't stop.
Certain puzzles are frustrating, but that is to be expected of a puzzle game. No glitches and not buggy. I really loved the co-op in this game. I would 100% recommend Portal and Portal 2 :)
